data.message: When people dont understand hes the king of controversy, so no matter if ur supporting him or talking shit, ur giving him exactly what he wants 😂😂😂😂😂  stans keep supporting and haters keep playing right into our hands 😂😂😂😂😂😂 ShadyTilIDie
